name: Keep summer garden safe!
description:
Keys:

Movement - WSAD
Pick/use item - E

How to play:

Flowers grow only when they are watered.
Moles try to destroy your flowers, put traps to stop them.
Repair flower patches with hammer and crop your plants with hoe.
Get points for planting and growing your flowers, get 5000 and win!

Keep summer garden safe!

Start your own garden, plant flowers, water them and finally crop what you deserves. There is unfortunately a slight problem. MOLES! They try to eat your preciuos plants and destroy patches.

Protect plants with traps but remember to take care of your flowers. Without water they will not improve.

Keep the balance and win!

This game is entry for Ludum Dare 46 game jam! Please leave a comment and rate so I can make better games in the future.

Cheers and good luck! :)
